law.catch_line: An officer, agent, or employee of a carrier may not issue or aid in issuing a duplicate or additiona...
law.text:
An officer, agent, or employee of a carrier may not issue or aid in issuing a duplicate or additional negotiable bill of lading for any goods in violation of § 7-402 of this article:
With intent to defraud; and
With knowledge that the original bill of lading for the goods is outstanding and uncancelled.
